an2.133:1: "Bhikkhus, a female lay follower endowed with faith, rightly aspiring, should aspire thus: ‘May I become like the female lay followers Khujjuttarā and Veḷukaṇṭakī Nandamātā!’This is the standard and criterion for my female lay disciples, that is, the female lay followers Khujjuttarā and Veḷukaṇṭakī Nandamātā."[n.322] SeeAN.260,AN.262. The latter's name is also spelled Veḷukaṇṭakiyā and Veḷukaṇdakī.
